labels.type-of-hayya-visit-desc: Select the type of Hayya Visit you need for your journey:
labels.tourist-card-description: Are you planning to come to Qatar for visiting its beautiful spots? Request Hayya to enter the country
labels.conference-card-description: Will you attend an event or conference hosted in Qatar? To participate you need to get an Hayya
labels.hayya-with-me-card-description: Do you receive a voucher code by a family member or a friends? Redeem your code and request Hayya.

info.number-of-visa: The number of visa options are subject to variations
info.tourist-category-note: * All these categories are included in the “Tourist” type: Tourist Entry (A1), GCC Resident Entry (A2), Entry with ETA (A3) (Holder of Schengen, USA, UK Visa/Residency), Entry for Companion of the GCC Citizen (A4)

entry-for-gcc-resident-min-6-month.title: Entry for GCC residents with valid residence of minimum 6 months from date of arrival to Qatar

entry-for-visitor-gcc-citizen.title: Entry for visitor who is accompanying a GCC citizen visiting the State of Qatar

entry-for-visitor-valid-schengen.title: Entry for visitor who already have a valid Schengen, US or UK, visa or residence
entry-for-visitor-valid-schengen.point-1: You need a copy of valid UK, US, Schengen visa or residence

invitation-international-guest.title: An invitation extended to international guest

leave-hayya-process.description: Are you sure you want to leave the Hayya application process?

submit-hayya-app.description: Are you sure you want to submit your Hayya application? You’ll be able to review its progress in your Hayya account.

we-can-speed-up.description: We can speed up the process by pre-filling the Hayya application form with data from one of your previous requests.

hints.voucher-code-hint: Copy and paste the voucher code you received

ready-to-start-note.title: You are ready to start!
ready-to-start-note.description: Before proceeding please keep this information at hand:
ready-to-start-note.point-2: Valid ID (passport or Qatar ID). For passport holder the validity should be at least 6 months.
ready-to-start-note.point-4: Hotel booking for the duration of your stay*
ready-to-start-note.summary: * in case someone is hosting you, please be sure they register it on the portal

your-voucher-code-is-valid.title: You Voucher code is valid!
your-voucher-code-is-valid.description: You can proceed applying for your Hayya, but before proceeding please keep this information at hand:
your-voucher-code-is-valid.point-2: Valid ID (passport or Qatar ID). For passport holder the validity should be at least 3 months.
your-voucher-code-is-valid.point-4: Hotel booking for the duration of your stay*
your-voucher-code-is-valid.summary: * in case someone is hosting you, please be sure they register it on the portal

voucher-code-not-valid.title: Ops! It seems this voucher code is no more valid
voucher-code-not-valid.description: Please be sure this code has not been used previously for an Hayya request. We suggest you get in touch with the person that shared with you the code or request support from our

voucher-code-valid.title: You Voucher code is valid!
voucher-code-valid.description: You can proceed applying for your Hayya, but before proceeding please keep this information at hand:
voucher-code-valid.point-2: Valid ID (passport or Qatar ID). For passport holder the validity should be at least 6 months.

labels.i-am-intl-passport-holder: I am an international passport holder

hints.browse-for-pic-hint: Only image file (.jpg or .jpeg) are allowed. Max file size 1MB. Only the following special characters are allowed in the file name . - _

info.after-upload-id-note: After uploading your ID, your data will be extracted automatically
info.auto-field-fill-warn: Kindly re-check the auto-filled fields before proceeding, otherwise it might get rejected.

not-eligible.title: Ops! It seems you  are not eligible to apply fo Hayya
not-eligible.description: At the moment you can’t proceed with your Hayya application. For more information please get in touch with our Hayya support team.

minimum-validity.title: Ops! It seems you can’t proceed with the application
minimum-validity.description: The minimum passport validity for applying for Hayya is 6 months. The passport expiration date seems to be sooner than this.

labels.reviewed-instr-upload-gcc-link: instructions to upload GCC resident permit document
labels.have-prev-citizenship: Do you have a previous/other citizenship?

hints.upload-gcc-doc-hint: Only image file (.jpg or .jpeg) are allowed. Max file size 1MB. Only the following special characters are allowed in the file name . - _
hints.upload-visa-card-copy: Only image file (.jpg or .jpeg) are allowed. Max file size 1MB. Only the following special characters are allowed in the file name . - _
hints.upload-gcc-permit-doc: Only image file (.jpg or .jpeg) are allowed. Max file size 1MB. Only the following special characters are allowed in the file name.

job-title.heading: Job Title
job-title.point-1: If the Job Title does not match the Job Title in your Residency Permit you will not be allowed to enter Qatar
job-title.point-2: If you do not find your Job Title please use another Hayya category

placeholder.specify-accommodation-name: Enter the name of you stay (example hotel name)

no-body-hosting.title: Ops! It seems nobody is hosting you at the moment
no-body-hosting.description: Please ask your host to register your stay on the Hayya portal. After that you can resume your application for the Hayya Entry Permit.

you-are-hosted.title: You are hosted!
you-are-hosted.description: Great, we checked and found a match with a registered host. You can proceed with your Hayya application!

i-have-read-terms.description: I’ve read and agree to Hayya

general-entry-permit.title: General Entry Permit of Qatar for visit and tourism

description.point-2: Accommodation proof is required Health Insurance required

labels.you-are-done-summary: Your Hayya application has been submitted successfully.
labels.go-to-hayya-guide: Go to your Hayya account, to monitor approval status of your application, manage your information and add companions to trip.

labels.entry-with-eta-a3: Entry with ETA (A3)(Holder of Schengen, USA, UK Visa/Residency)
labels.entry-for-companion-a4: Entry for Companion of the GCC Citizen (A4)

category.entry-with-eta-a3: Entry with ETA (A3) (Holder of Schengen, USA, UK Visa/Residency)
category.entry-for-gcc-a4: Entry for Companion of the GCC Citizen (A4)
